buildCommand: npm install --save-dev typescript && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --force && next build
installCommand: npm install --save-dev typescript && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --force && npm install tailwindcss@3.3.0 autoprefixer@10.4.21 postcss@8.4.33 postcss-selector-parser@6.0.10 postcss-nested@6.0.1 postcss-preset-env@9.5.0 --legacy-peer-deps --force
